children.text: Design and production of personalized birthday invitations and stationery.
Creation of a custom event website for guest information, RSVPs, and updates.
Advanced lighting arrangements to enhance the party ambiance, including LED lights and color themes.
A photo booth setup with fun props and customizable backgrounds for guest entertainment.
Custom cake design services for a unique birthday cake that matches the party theme.
Booking of entertainers or activities suitable for birthday parties, such as magicians, DJs, or games.
Professional dance lessons and a choreographed performance to entertain guests.
Customized decor services, including balloon sculptures and thematic decorations.
Design and production of personalized party favors for guests to take home.
Aerial photography and videography to capture unique views of the birthday celebration.
Live music or performance acts tailored to the birthday theme and audience.
Technical setup and coordination for virtual guest participation, including live streaming services.

for your upcoming birthday celebration. We are thrilled at the chance to work alongside you to bring your vision to life, ensuring a fun-filled and memorable experience for you and all your guests. Our commitment is to provide unparalleled service, detailed planning, and flawless execution from the beginning to the end of your event.

Within this proposal, you will find a detailed overview of our tiered birthday party planning services, each thoughtfully designed to cater to the diverse array of themes, sizes, and preferences you might have in mind. Whether you're looking to host a cozy, intimate gathering or a grand, festive bash, our packages are tailored to fit every type of birthday party and budget, making sure your celebration unfolds just as you've imagined it to be.
We're excited to embark on this planning journey with you and look forward to making your birthday not just a party, but an unforgettable experience.

Let's begin by gathering some key details about your event. How many guests are you planning to invite, and in which season will the event take place? These important factors will help us tailor our pricing and services more accurately to your event's specific needs.
Specify the number of guests in the "Guests" dropdown.
Specify the planned season for your event in the "Season" dropdown.
Crafting Your Dream Event: Choose Your Tier

Now, let's move on to selecting the right service tier for your birthday party. Please read each description carefully to understand the range of services included in each tier. This step is crucial for aligning our offerings with your vision and ensuring that we provide the best possible experience tailored to your event's unique requirements.

"Simplicity Meets Fun"
Ideal for intimate gatherings, our Basic Tier offers essential support including venue recommendations, basic decor and theme consultation, and on-the-day party coordination. This package is designed for those who appreciate the charm of simplicity, ensuring your smaller celebrations are memorable and effortless. Embrace the joy of simplicity with streamlined planning and execution.

"Personalized Fun"
Our Standard Tier elevates your party with enhanced theme development, comprehensive vendor referrals, full-day event coordination, decor conceptualization, and customized party timeline creation. Perfect for more significant gatherings like milestone birthdays, this package promises a seamless blend of fun and personal touch, making your event uniquely yours.

"Ultimate Celebration"
Our Luxurious Tier is crafted for those seeking unparalleled sophistication and excitement in their celebration, offering exclusive venue scouting, elite vendor access, and complete event design, styling, and execution. Tailored for lavish parties and grand celebrations, this package ensures your event stands out with elegance and flair, providing an unmatched level of luxury and customization.

Each tier has been thoughtfully put together to cater to different types of birthday celebrations, from cozy and intimate gatherings to lavish and grand parties, ensuring that your special day is celebrated in the style it deserves.
Please select the tier that best fits your event's vision and needs from the dropdown menu after reviewing the options. The price and service list is displayed below.
In the 'AddOnsChoice' table, tick the boxes in the 'Want' column for any add-ons you'd like to include in your event.
That's it! Please review the pricing, and don't hesitate to contact us if you have any questions or need further assistance.

for your event planning, kindly go through this proposal and reach out to us. We're eager to delve into any part of this proposal with you, tailor our services to fit your needs perfectly, and clarify any queries you might hold.
